}}On October 25th, Scott Olsen, a former [[United States Marine Corps|Marine]] and [[Iraq War]] veteran, and a member of [[Veterans for Peace]], suffered a [[bone fracture|skull fracture]] caused by a shooting [[projectile]] that witnesses believed was a tear gas or smoke canister fired by the police.<ref name="Reuters Olsen">{{cite news
â
On October 25th, Scott Olsen, a former [[United States Marine Corps|Marine]] and [[Iraq War]] veteran, and a member of [[Veterans for Peace]], suffered a [[bone fracture|skull fracture]] caused by a shooting [[projectile]] that witnesses believed was a tear gas or smoke canister fired by the police.<ref name="Reuters Olsen">{{cite news

}}</ref> A video by protesters has surfaced showing the explosion of a flash-bang device thrown by one officer near protesters attempting to aid Olsen.<ref name="Guardian_Olsen">{{cite news

â
}}</ref> ''[[The Guardian]]'' reported that a projectile found near where Olsen fell was a [[bean bag round]].<ref name="Guardian_Olsen"/> Olsen was rushed to the hospital by other protesters, who were fired upon with unknown police projectiles while attempting to aid him.<ref name="Gabbatt Olsen">{{cite news |author=Adam Gabbatt |title=Occupy Oakland: Iraq war veteran in critical condition after police clashes |publisher=The Guardian |date=October 26, 2011
+
}}</ref>
  +
''[[The Guardian]]'' reported that a projectile found near where Olsen fell was a [[bean bag round]].<ref name="Guardian_Olsen"/> Olsen was rushed to the hospital by other protesters, who were fired upon with unknown police projectiles while attempting to aid him.<ref name="Gabbatt Olsen">{{cite news |author=Adam Gabbatt |title=Occupy Oakland: Iraq war veteran in critical condition after police clashes |publisher=The Guardian |date=October 26, 2011
|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/oct/26/occupy-oakland-veteran-critical-condition |accessdate=October 29, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=Marine Veteran Injured by Non-Lethal Rounds at Occupy Oakland |publisher=Veterans Today |date=October 26, 2011 |url= http://www.veteranstoday.com/2011/10/26/marine-veteran-injured-by-non-lethal-rounds-at-occupy-oakland/ |accessdate=October 26, 2011}}</ref> At least two other protesters were injured.<ref name=rt261011/> The [[American Civil Liberties Union]] and [[National Lawyers Guild]] are calling for an investigation into the use of excessive force by Oakland police.<ref name="return">{{cite news |last=Bender |first=Kristen |title=Occupy Oakland protesters return downtown to claim Frank Ogawa Plaza |url=http://www.mercurynews.com/ci_19197518 |accessdate=October 27, 2011 |newspaper=Oakland Tribune |date=October 26, 2011}}</ref> However, the investigation by the Citizens Police Review Board is expected to last several months. <ref>{{cite web|title=Occupy Oakland: police to be investigated over Scott Olsen injury|last=Gabbat|first=Adam|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/01/occupy-oakland-police-scott-olsen|work=The Guardian}}</ref>
|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/oct/26/occupy-oakland-veteran-critical-condition |accessdate=October 29, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |title=Marine Veteran Injured by Non-Lethal Rounds at Occupy Oakland |publisher=Veterans Today |date=October 26, 2011 |url= http://www.veteranstoday.com/2011/10/26/marine-veteran-injured-by-non-lethal-rounds-at-occupy-oakland/ |accessdate=October 26, 2011}}</ref> At least two other protesters were injured.<ref name=rt261011/> The [[American Civil Liberties Union]] and [[National Lawyers Guild]] are calling for an investigation into the use of excessive force by Oakland police.<ref name="return">{{cite news |last=Bender |first=Kristen |title=Occupy Oakland protesters return downtown to claim Frank Ogawa Plaza |url=http://www.mercurynews.com/ci_19197518 |accessdate=October 27, 2011 |newspaper=Oakland Tribune |date=October 26, 2011}}</ref> However, the investigation by the Citizens Police Review Board is expected to last several months. <ref>{{cite web|title=Occupy Oakland: police to be investigated over Scott Olsen injury|last=Gabbat|first=Adam|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/01/occupy-oakland-police-scott-olsen|work=The Guardian}}</ref>
